name: verifyPickUpDiscountIsAppliedCorrectly

statusDetails.message:
Element should be clickable: interactable and enabled {[id='top-cart-btn-checkout']}
Element: '<button class="action primary checkout button" data-action="close" data-bind="
                        attr: {
                            title: $t('Proceed to Checkout')
                        },
                        disable: !getCartParam('possible_onepage_checkout'),
                        click: closeMinicart()
                    , i18n: 'Proceed to Checkout'" id="top-cart-btn-checkout" title="Замовити" type="button" displayed:false></button>'
Actual value: hidden, opacity=1

description: Verify that when user placing an order, if he select pickup, a discount is applied.
